title: 训练计划 IV (训练计划 IV)
content: 思路: // @Title: 训练计划 IV (训练计划 IV) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-02-20 21:07:47 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 41.3 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for singly-linked list. * public class ListNode { * int val; * ListNode next; * ListNode(int x) { val = x; } * } */ class Solution { public ListNode mergeTwoLists(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) { if(l1==null){ return l2; } if(l2==null){ return l1; } ListNode temp; if(l1.val<l2.val){ temp=l1; l1=l1.next; }else{ temp=l2; l2=l2.next; } temp.next=mergeTwoLists(l1,l2); return temp; } }
